https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cTUoCdAU3fGWFXmjNcuitXaxlIf.jpg A Super-8 film shot in 1997, re-edited and reworked with ink and bleach applied directly onto the footage. Parts of the original action can still be seen, though the emphasis is placed on texture, colour and the electronic music soundtrack. Angel Recovered
